divs: sighting detailswhile in lethbridge, alberta around 11:30 pm on sept 29, 2012 i observed 4 to 5 bright, round objects streaking across the southern sky (200 degrees) in an organized formation. much faster then a plane, slower then a satellite and not like a comet\meteor. it was a full moon last night and these objects streaked across the south, south-west sky and disappearded into the bright moon light in 5-10 seconds. i heard no sounds and objects were very far off on the horizon.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Lethbridge
There were no other sightings in Lethbridge on or around September 29th 2012
Summary: South, SWest sky around 11:30pm, about 4 to 5 small, bright objects streaked across the sky in a formation. Much faster then a plane but slower then a shooting start
